title: 'Thanks penz solution'
body: 'I recently purchased the Parker Frontier Matte Black GT Rollerball Pen from Seller Penz Solutions
column5: and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed with both the product and the seller. This pen embodies the perfect blend of style
column8: making it an absolute gem for anyone in need of a dependable writing instrument.  I would like to express my heartfelt appreciation for Penz Solutions. Their professionalism and dedication to customer satisfaction have left a lasting impression on me. From the moment I placed my order to the timely delivery and the quality of the product
column9: everything exceeded my expectations. Penz Solutions has gained a loyal customer in me
column10: and I will not hesitate to recommend them to friends and colleagues. Keep up the\xa0excellent\xa0work.'

title: 'Ridiculous service by Amazon'
body: I was supposed to receive this order on the 28th/29th July. I don't get any update on the delivery. Today I receive a call saying that the item and being taken back since I have not accepted the delivery. I have not received any call or message about the delivery. If I don't need it, why would I place the order and pay. Have not expected such nasty delivery service from Amazon. Facing the same problem since 4 months. Amazon doesn't deserve even one star. Not anymore.

title: 'Very good pen ....!!'
body: Initially, I disappointed because, the refill were not running properly infact it was breaking. Then I returned and replaced the same pen and to my surprise!!!!! The pen came in return fullfilled my all expectations! It's really very nice pen... The build quality is good.. and a refill runs very very smoothly and dark too !! The looks are very good.... I didnt post pics of the pen here only because amazon was asking permission for accessing my storage and I wasn't willing so. One can always buy this pen blindly as it looks very descent n classic !

title: 'A Good Pen
rating: but the nip dries too quick'
body: '3.0 out of 5 stars'
column5: The pen is nice when you're in the flow, but don't use it for 24 hours and come back the next day. The ink dries and you'd have to spend time drawing squiggles before the flow comes back.  It skips quite a bit. I personally had a much better experience with Cello Signature. It works smoothly and writes on practically anything and everything without giving much issues. Maybe this Parker is good if you got the absolute best of paper quality and write everyday, just maybe not a work-horse really.
